meanings.sent1: The rabbit latened behind the bushes to avoid the fox.
meanings.sent2: The sun latened behind the clouds, casting a shadow over the field.
meanings.sent3: The treasure latened in the old chest, waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent4: Her smile latened as she tried to suppress her laughter.
meanings.sent5: The ninja latened into the darkness, blending seamlessly with the night.

meanings.definition: To become less visible or prominent
meanings.sent1: As the storm approached, the stars latened in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The colors of the painting latened over time, losing their vibrancy.
meanings.sent3: The singer latened into the background as the spotlight shifted to the guitarist.
meanings.sent4: His influence latened as new leaders emerged in the community.
meanings.sent5: The memories latened in her mind, fading with each passing year.
